text: eyata ovun “o suayib! api, apage mutun mittan næmadu devivarunva athæra damana menda, api apage vastungen ape kæmættata anuva katayutu kirima athæra damana menda, (oba apata niyoga karana lesada) obage salatayada obava polamba vanne? niyata vasayenma oba itamat karunaven yutu rju keneki!” yayi (samaccalayen men) pævasuha
